mapper.insert: insert into orders(number, products_id, num, address, contact, phone, state, create_time, update_time, end_time) VALUES(#{number},#{productsId},#{num},#{address},#{contact},#{phone},#{state},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{endTime})
mapper.update: update orders set products_id = #{productsId}, num = #{num}, address = #{address}, contact = #{contact}, phone = #{phone}, state = #{state}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from orders where id = #{orderId} and state = 4
